statements: DELETE FROM satellite_positions WHERE latitude > 30.00 AND longitude < -90.00;
DELETE FROM satellite_positions WHERE satellite_id = 1 AND latitude < 50.00;
DELETE FROM satellite_positions WHERE longitude > -100.00 AND satellite_name = 'Satellite X';
DELETE FROM orbits WHERE orbit_type = 'polar' AND orbit_period = 90.0;
DELETE FROM satellites WHERE altitude < 1000 AND latitude > 0;
DELETE FROM positions WHERE satellite_id = 1 AND timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM orbits WHERE altitude > 1000 AND orbit_type = 'polar';
DELETE FROM positions WHERE timestamp < '2022-01-01' AND satellite_id = 'f1e5e2c0-7b0e-48bc-87a5-50ba46d54bc7';
DELETE FROM satellite_orbits WHERE inclination > 30 AND eccentricity < 0.5;
